DOC.criteria: 18 year old 65 year old , diagnosis primary headache Allergy study medication , pregnant , breastfeeding , prisoner , nonenglish speaking , eligible receive droperidol base ED protocol ( see ) , patient head trauma , infection , vascular disorder , disorder facial cranial structure suspect ED Droperidol Protocol Droperidol must NOT use patient follow : Known suspect QT prolongation , include congenital long QT syndrome Cardiac Disease [ cardiomyopathy , congestive heart failure , hypertension , ischemic heart disease , myocardial infarction , bradycardia ( < 50 bpm ) ] History following : Renal failure Cerebrovascular disease Diabetes hypoglycemia Alcoholism/alcohol abuse Pituitary insufficiency Hypothyroidism Hypothermia Anorexia Advanced age ( > 65 yr ) Use follow medication : digoxin , benzodiazepine , diuretic , IV opiates , medication know prolong QTc interval .
